title: Additive engineering strategies for improved interfacial stability in lithium metal batteries

Kun Ryu, Kyungbin Lee, Jeonghoon Lim, Michael J. Lee, Keun-Hee Kim, Un Hwan Lee, Bernardine Rinkel, Kyungmo Kim, Soohyun Kim, Dayoung Kim, Dongseok Shin, Bryan D. McCloskey, Joonhee Kang, Seung Woo Lee
Electrolyte engineering is crucial for advancing lithium (Li) metal batteries (LMBs). Currently, unstable electrode-electrolyte interfaces limit the stable cycling of LMBs. Here, we introduce an additive engineering approach aimed at...
